message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a host of features that will significantly enhance your experience. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $11500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I am willing to consider your counteroffer. However, I must maintain a fair pricing structure. Therefore, I propose a counter-counteroffer of $11000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. Considering the value of the product and the discussions we've had, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $10800.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10700 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I understand your position and I'm glad we're making progress. Given the discussions we've had and the value of the product, I am willing to accept $10600 as the final price for the product.
